attributes.action: Change Law On Gun related Crime And Youth Violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the PM To review the current laws on both of the above.

Gun related Crime. 

With Current gun crime rife in this country i call for the govenment to change the sentences any person including minors who comit a crime using a firearm. You do the crime you do the time anyone who comits murder should have no human rights and should face life in prison. The murdered person or persons do not have there rights taken into account. LIFE MEANS LIFE ACT NOW.

Youth Violence.

Again with the increasing news reports of gangs of youths causing trouble i call for the Courts to be able to auto enlist any offender found guilty into the armed forces for a minimum of 10 yrs with no option of leaving. Lets see how big they are then.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
